newsitem.title: NIGERIA: Nigerian 42-day T-bill sold at average 11.7000 pct.
newsitem.headline: Nigerian 42-day T-bill sold at average 11.7000 pct.

text.p: Nigeria's Central Bank said on Friday it sold 1,777 million naira worth of 42-day treasury bills carrying a weighted average rate of 11.7000 percent.
Bids totalled 1,777 million naira and the true yield will be 11.8589 percent.
Last week's sales were 2,585 million naira worth of 42-day treasury bills at a weighted average rate of 11.6990 percent.
